project.name: Nuxeo Placeful Configuration Service - Core
project.description: Nuxeo Enterprise Platform: The Placeful Configuration Service allow component to declare configuration/annotation on content objects. This is mainly use to define and store configuration of content/service (ex: subscription to user notifications on a given folder). This service also manage configuration inheritance in the content tree (ex: on this particular folder, get all "subscriptions" from users to this notification with inheritance from parent folders).
